job.title: NOPCommerce certified developer - C#, ASP.NET
job.description:
If you are a NOPCommerce certified developer with experience, please read on! We are currently seeking a NOPCommerce certified developer to help expand our ecommerce platform options. As on of the most prestigious schools in our field in the West Coast we would prefer a local candidate to the Southern California Area but are remote flexible. This role is a full time direct position on our growing team.
Salary $80,000 - $120,000 per year
What You Need for this Position
" Experience with Microsoft Stack (C#, ASP.NET, MVC)
" eCommerce experience
Nice to have
" .NET Core
" Agile experience
What's In It for You
" Competitive Base Salary!
" Excellent Benefits Package!
" Flexible Work Schedule!
" Accelerated Career Growth!
So, if you are a NOPCommerce certified developer with experience, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Stephen.Maroda@CyberCoders.com
Stephen Maroda - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
